content: 9 single_crochet 2 decrease single_crochet 4 20 15 single_crochet 4 single_crochet 2 decrease single_crochet 8 single_crochet 2 decrease single_crochet 4 18 16 single_crochet 4 single_crochet 2 decrease single_crochet 7 single_crochet 2 decrease single_crochet 3 16 finish off you can simply tuck yarn ends into pouch internal balls optional make 2 worked in the round in a spiral 1 magic_ring 6 single_crochet 6 2 single_crochet increase in ea st around 12 3 *single_crochet increase 3 single_crochet* repeat * 3 times 15 4 single_crochet in ea st around 15 5 *single_crochet 2 decrease 3 single_crochet* repeat 3 times 12 stuff ball here stuff it very firmly 6 single_crochet 2 decrease all around 6 finish off leaving a long tail use tail to sew top closed and hide end in ball assembly insert internal balls into testicles and then lightly stuff it stuff the head of the penis firmly and then lightly stuff the shaft sew the penis and testicles together at the top with the fuller part of the head of the penis facing inwards towards the testicles depending on how you are wearing the packer you can also add a stitch about halfway down the testicles to attach the penis to the balls so it stays put do not use this if you are using the harness below harness loop 1 chain 18 single_crochet in first chain to join chain 2 half_double_crochet in ea st around slip_stitch to top of first st to join 18 2 chain 2 half_double_crochet in same st as join half_double_crochet 4 turn work 5 3-5 chain 2 half_double_crochet in same st 4 half_double_crochet turn work 5 finish off leaving a 12 tail for sewing later weave in other end harness belt 1 chain 5 single_crochet in 2nd chain from hook single_crochet across turn work 4 2-10 chain 1 single_crochet in same st single_crochet across turn work 4 11-14 chain 2 double_crochet in same st double_crochet across turn work 4 15-19 chain 1 single_crochet in same st single_crochet across turn work 4 20-x chain 2 double_crochet in same st double_crochet across turn work 4 work until the ends of the belt are about an inch apart when wrapped tight and low around your waist genuinely make sure you pull it tight crochet is stretchy so if it s loose now then the belt will be too loose later x+1 chain 1 single_crochet in same st single_crochet across turn work 4 x+2 chain 3 tc in same st as join tc across 4 x+3 chain 1 single_crochet in same st single_crochet across turn work 4 x+4 chain 3 tc in same st as join tc across 4 x+5 chain 1 single_crochet in same st single_crochet across turn work 4 x+6 chain 3 tc in same st as join tc across 4 x+7 chain 1 single_crochet in same st single_crochet across turn work 4 x+8 chain 3 tc in same st as join tc across 4 x+9 chain 1 single_crochet in same st single_crochet across turn work 4 finish
